# Data Cleaning

```{r}
#read csv
Data <- read.csv("dataset03.csv")
#give gender a code if gender is male it will be 1 else it will be 0
Data <- Data %>%
  mutate(
    gender.code <- ifelse(Household.Head.Sex == 'Male',1,0)
  )
#give household type a code, it can be a matrix the rows are separatly single family extended family and Two or More Nonrelated Persons/Members, if it matches the type of the row it will be 1 else will be 0.
Data_Household <- Data %>%
  mutate(
    single <- ifelse(Type.of.Household=='Single Family',1,0),
    extend <- ifelse(Type.of.Household=='Extended Family',1,0),
    more <- ifelse(Type.of.Household=='Two or More Nonrelated Persons/Members',1,0)
    
  )
```
